attributes.action: To allow students with demands to wear blazers, to be able to take them off.
attributes.additional_details: As so students don’t get too hot as it could stop them from learning as well.
attributes.background: To allow schoolchildren with demands to wear blazers, to be allowed to remove them, as so they don’t overheat. Frankly, I think it’s ridiculous that some children are forced to wear blazers even at the most scorching temperatures.

rejection.details:
Decisions about uniform are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. Government guidance "strongly recommends" that schools "consider how comfortable the proposed uniform will be for pupils" and "take a sensible approach to allow for exceptions to be made during extreme weather".

You may wish to sign this petition: "Update school uniform guidance to prioritise comfort for students in England" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727890
